segments.text: I notice the girl standing attentively, her arm raised, silently pleading for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her excitement is palpable, and it makes me smile.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I feel a wave of disappointment wash over me when I think about the sneaky way they’re getting the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s so obvious that they shouldn’t be up to this mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but imagine what would happen if their mother caught them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The chaos would erupt, shattering their little bubble of joy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a moment of innocence, but also a moment on the brink of disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
